FunGL documentation

1

Overview

This system enables a user to create projects containing polls which contain questions. Anyone can create a user for the system, they are then allowed to create 1 project with 1 poll. The admins of the system can change the allowed amount of projects and polls. Each poll is allowed to have a maximum of 15question.

Install

point your browser to http://site.tld/path_to_fungl/install on your webserver. Example: http://patch.dk/install if you placed the fungl directly in the top folder of your domain.

Gotyas

The voting cookie will expire after 1 week. This will have the effect that 1 week after the user has voted he is allowed to vote again on the same poll.

Howto extend FunGL

Change the menu

To change the items in the menu you should edit the menu/* files If you need more than 5 items in the menu you need to edit the screenstyle.css file to avoid that the menu will break into 2 lines.

Add new charts

Create a new file in classes/Charts/ The file must be named the same as the class and the class must extend ChartCommon Add the class Name to the array in config.php

Possible improvement to FunGL

  • User selectable timezone, so it is easier to predict when a poll is changed.
  • Comment on polls
  • Localize the system
